Line Of Sight¶

Example use

import rlfl

# Check line of sight between two points
have_los = rlfl.los(map_number, p1, p2)

Function list:¶

rlfl.los(map_number, p1, p2)¶

Determine if there is a line of sight between two points. All cells in between have to be seen and non-blocking.

Returns True or False.
